plot: Lucy Carter, a widow with two teen children, takes a job as a secretary for her stuffy brother-in-law.
plot_en: Lucy Carter, a widow with two teen children, takes a job as a secretary for her stuffy brother-in-law.
plot_es: Lucy Carter, a widow with two teen children, takes a job as a secretary for her stuffy brother-in-law.
title: Aquí está Lucy
